tpk::AutoGuider

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Auto-guider virtual telescope.

The auto-guider class predicts the position in the focal plane that a guide star should be found and adjusts the telescope pointing model (via a pointing controller) on the basis of the position at which the star is actually detected.

The adjustements are first smoothes by a filter to e.g. remove noise due to seeing.

All the methods of this class are thread safe.

Member Function Documentation

int tpk::AutoGuider::track ( unsigned int  samples  )  throw ()

Predict guide star trajectory for an in-position rotator.

Predicts the x,y in the guider coordinate frame of the guide star at the time of the last "tick" of the kernel fast loop.

The guider prediction assumes that the rotator is at its demanded position.

The units of the trajectories are millimeters and seconds.

Returns:
status
Return values:
0 success
!=0 target cannot be imaged
Parameters:
samples  number of samples to generate

int tpk::AutoGuider::track ( unsigned int  samples,
const Trajectory &  rma 
) throw ()

Predict guide star position.

Predicts the x,y in the guider coordinate frame of the guide star at the time of the last "tick" of the kernel fast loop for a rotator at the specified position.

The units of the trajectories are millimeters and seconds.

Returns:
status
Return values:
0 success
!=0 target cannot be imaged
Parameters:
samples  number of samples to generate
rma  rotator trajectory

void tpk::AutoGuider::measure ( const double &  t,
const double &  xm,
const double &  ym 
)

Updates measured position of guide star.

The difference between the measured position and the predicted position at that time is pushed into the filter.

Parameters:
t  TAI of measurement (MJD)
xm  measured x position (guider coordinates)
ym  measured y position (guider coordinates)

void tpk::AutoGuider::guidePM ( bool  filter = true  ) 

Guide the telescope by adjusting the pointing model.

The current value of the filter is applied to the pointing controller.

Parameters:
filter  Apply mount axes filters

void tpk::AutoGuider::guideTarget (  ) 

Guide target position.

Updates the target position from the x,y measured by the guider.

Filter2D & tpk::AutoGuider::filter (  ) 

Get reference to filter.

Filter2D is a polymorphic type so it is up to the called to cast the reference to the correct type before using any of its methods.
